amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute inserted a complete new text entitled "Second Amendment Enforcement Act" and is intended to restore second amendment rights within the home for self-protection purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in House Report 110-852 to insert a complete new text entitled "Second Amendment Enforcement Act".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Childers amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 160, 1 Present (Roll no. 600).

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Childers.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Childers amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 160, 1 Present (Roll no. 600).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Childers.
